name: La Cucaracha
description:
La Cucaracha was developed during the Game Jam + Aracaju 2018. It is a party game where players have to fly their cockroach to accumulate garbage. The one that makes 50 points first is the winner!

How to play: 

The player can move foward by pressing Up and backward by pressing DOWN. To turn the cockroach, the player have to use LEFT or RIGHT. Just aim for the flying objects, take them and put them on the bag! 

Controls: 

  • Player 1: Arrow Keys
  • Player 2: WASD
  • Player 3: IJKL

Team: 

- Daniel Caldas as Musician, Game Designer and Programmer;

- Camila Alves as and Artist;

- Lucas Lima as a Artist and Programmer;

- Gustavo Garcia as Programmer and Game Designer;

- Washington Sales as a Colaborator.
